title: Adventures of Red Ryder
actors: Don 'Red' Barry, Noah Beery, Tommy Cook, Maude Allen, Vivian Austin, Harry Worth, Hal Taliaferro, William Farnum, Bob Kortman, Carleton Young, Ray Teal, Gene Alsace, Gayne Whitman, Hooper Atchley, John Dilson
description: Mesquite banker Calvin Drake plans to profit from the Santa Fe Railroad's acquisition of right-of-way by gaining control of the land in the territory. In the ensuing war of intimidation ...

title: Boccaccio '70
actors: Marisa Solinas, Germano Gilioli, Anita Ekberg, Peppino De Filippo, Romy Schneider, Tomas Milian, Romolo Valli, Sophia Loren, Luigi Giuliani, Alfio Vita
description: Inspired by Boccaccio's novellas, each episode focuses on sex, love and seduction in Italy's 1960s, an era of economic growth and major cultural changes.

title: Andrej Rublev
actors: Anatoliy Solonitsyn, Ivan Lapikov, Nikolay Grinko, Nikolay Sergeev, Irina Tarkovskaya, Nikolay Burlyaev, Yuriy Nazarov, Yuriy Nikulin, Rolan Bykov, Nikolay Grabbe, Mikhail Kononov, Stepan Krylov, Bolot Beyshenaliev, B. Matysik, Anatoliy Obukhov
description: The life, times and afflictions of the fifteenth-century Russian iconographer St. Andrei Rublev.

title: Ion: Blestemul pamîntului, blestemul iubirii
actors: Serban Ionescu, Ioana Craciunescu, Petrica Gheorghiu, Valentin Teodosiu, Ion Besoiu, Leopoldina Balanuta, Octavian Cotescu, Tamara Buciuceanu-Botez, Catrinel Dumitrescu, Romeo Pop, Rodica Negrea, Sorina Stanculescu, Valeria Seciu, Costel Constantin, Petre Lupu

title: Noi credevamo
language: Italian, French, English, Neapolitan, Sicilian, Polish
actors: Raffaele Di Florio, Francesca Inaudi, Andrea Bosca, Edoardo Natoli, Luigi Pisani, Guido Caprino, Fulvia Carotenuto, Renato Carpentieri, Alberto Coppola, Michele Riondino, Peppino Mazzotta, Nicola Pascale, Franco Ravera, Stefano Cassetti, Paolo Pierobon
description: The stories of three young men who, in the wake of the ferocious repression by the Bourbon reign in 1828, decide to join Giuseppe Mazzini's Young Italy movement.
